channel.title: How do i change the price of stuff in pk points?
channel.description: how do i change the shit in my pk shop from gp to pkp?

item.title: How do i change the price of stuff in pk points?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Most servers add an exception in their Shop’s Coin Method like so:

if (MyShopID == #) {
   if (PvPPoints < # && itemID == #) {
	PvPPoints -= #;
} else {
	sendMessage("blahblah");
break;
}

However, I highly recommend against doing this. You should edit your Shops Configuration File to accept more than one currency. That’s what I’ve done, and it makes everything alot cleaner and easier.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the price of stuff in pk points?
